long_description: Ready for the trails, the crankbrothers Mallet 2 bike pedals offer a wide platform, easy cleat engagement and adjustable pins for downhill or race use. Pedal bodies are made of aluminum and stamped steel for lasting, dependable performance with a wide platform for extra stability underfoot. Easy 4-sided entry into the cleat-retention mechanism makes these pedals a snap to engage with the included premium brass crankbrothers cleats (included). Forged chromoly steel spindles are paired with cartridge outer bearings and bushing inner bearings for dependable, smooth spinning. 12 screw pins provide adjustable traction to meet your grip preferences. The crankbrothers Mallet 2 bike pedals should only be used with the included crankbrothers cleats, which will fit almost any SPD-compatible shoes.
